content.raw:
Click on your name in the Cloudsim interface and it will show you some stats.

After ssh'ing into either of the two machines, I use the uptime command to see how long I have been in.

Rud Merriam, Can you see this post. I was using the new interface for the last two posts. I switched back to the old interface
content.html:
Click on your name in the Cloudsim interface and it will show you some stats.

After ssh'ing into either of the two machines, I use the uptime command to see how long I have been in.

Rud Merriam, Can you see this post. I was using the new interface for the last two posts. I switched back to the old interface
